alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 1:55PM CDT until May 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sumner, or 10 miles northeast of Lexington, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ansley, Mason City, Berwyn, Weissert, Westerville, Buckeye, Block Hill Basin, Arcadia Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Burr Oak, Gavin Siding, Intersection of Highway 183 and Cumro Road and Cumro. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 73 and 107. Highway 2 between mile markers 286 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 300 and 308. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
